archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Support Loyalty and Retention Management
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: The Support Loyalty and Retention function undertakes trend analysis on loyalty and retention, including customer acquisitions and churn. It comprises: � Follow-up of the churn rate: Development of a report in order to measure by period (periodicity: weekly, monthly, yearly�), � The number and rate of terminations by product & service, � The trend of the churn rate according to the previous periods. � Prediction of the churn (anticipate in order to minimise the attrition): identification of the potential churner profiles from a predictive model analysing the churner profiles according to the previous periods.
